alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Carson; Collingsworth; Donley; Gray; Hemphill; Hutchinson; Roberts; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 08 at 3:26PM CDT until April 08 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE EASTERN PANHANDLES... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 11 PM CDT SATURDAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE EASTERN PANHANDLES... The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 10 AM to 11 PM CDT Saturday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * Affected Area...In Texas...Hutchinson...Roberts...Hemphill... Carson...Gray...Wheeler...Armstrong...Donley and Collingsworth. * 20 Foot Winds...Northwest 20 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph today. Southwest 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph on Saturday. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 percent today. As low as 6 percent on Saturday. * Red Flag Threat Index...2 to 4 today. 4 to 6 on Saturday. * Timing...Through 8 PM today. From 10 AM to 11 PM CDT Saturday.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will create favorable weather for rapid fire growth and spread. Avoid activities that promote open flames and sparks.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Carson; Collingsworth; Donley; Gray; Hemphill; Hutchinson; Roberts; Wheeler
